primary.name: Dart Monkey
primary.description: The Dart Monkey is a versatile and cost-effective tower available from the start.

primary.name: Boomerang Monkey
primary.description: The Boomerang Monkey is great for hitting multiple bloons at once with its wide boomerang attack.

primary.name: Bomb Shooter
primary.description: The Bomb Shooter deals heavy explosive damage, perfect for taking out large groups of bloons.

primary.name: Tack Shooter
primary.description: The Tack Shooter fires tacks in multiple directions, great for hitting nearby bloons.

primary.name: Ice Monkey
primary.description: The Ice Monkey freezes bloons in place, making them easier to pop.

primary.name: Glue Gunner
primary.description: The Glue Gunner slows down bloons by covering them in sticky glue.

military.name: Sniper Monkey
military.description: Long-range precision tower that can hit bloons anywhere on the map.

military.name: Monkey Sub
military.description: Water-based tower that can submerge and attack bloons over a large range.

military.name: Monkey Buccaneer
military.description: Naval tower that combines fast attacks and powerful upgrades for destroying bloons.

military.name: Monkey Ace
military.description: Airborne tower that flies in patterns and drops explosives on bloons.

military.name: Heli Pilot
military.description: Airborne tower that can follow your cursor or patrol an area, firing rapidly at bloons.

military.name: Mortar Monkey
military.description: Launches explosive mortars at a targeted area, great for grouped bloons.

military.name: Dartling Gunner
military.description: Fires a continuous stream of darts and can be aimed in any direction.

magic.name: Wizard Monkey
magic.description: Magic-based tower with powerful spells, great for a variety of situations.

magic.name: Super Monkey
magic.description: A fast-attacking, high-cost tower that can demolish bloons with ease.

magic.name: Ninja Monkey
magic.description: Fast and stealthy tower, capable of popping camo bloons and dealing great damage.

magic.name: Alchemist
magic.description: Applies powerful potions to buff nearby towers and harm bloons.

magic.name: Druid
magic.description: Uses nature-based attacks to deal damage to bloons and provide support to your defenses.

magic.name: Mermonkey
magic.description: A water-based magic tower with mystical abilities to control bloons.

support.name: Banana Farm
support.description: Generates income to boost your economy during the game.

support.name: Spike Factory
support.description: Generates spikes on the path to help pop bloons passing through.

support.name: Monkey Village
support.description: Provides buffs and upgrades to nearby towers, making them more effective.

support.name: Engineer Monkey
support.description: Builds sentries and traps to help control bloons and support other towers.

support.name: Beast Handler
support.description: Commands beasts to assist in popping bloons and dealing additional damage.
